subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Radio Shack Box/hi---fine---i'm_Uncle_ben.mp3 
  Uploaded by : urkel232002 <urkel23@...> 
  Description : "Hi---I'm Fine---I'm Uncle Ben"--- My friend ron sent me some raw audio and i went over a little bit so far.  I think this is a great file, it's off a modified RS 12-469 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Radio%20Shack%20Box/hi---fine---i%27m_Uncle_ben.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/help/us/groups/files

Regards,

urkel232002 <urkel23@...>
